text: Bakkaatu fawaaki ɓe e baabiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓen, wanaa kadi ɓiɗɓe maɓɓe ɓen, wanaa banndiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓen, wanaa e ɓiɗɓe banndiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓen, wanaa e ɓiɗɓe miññiraaɓe maɓɓe rewɓe ɓen, wanaa e rewɓe maɓɓe ɓen, wanaa e ɓen ɓe ɓe jeyiri ñaame maɓɓe. Hulee Alla (yo suddiiɓe). Pellet, Alla siforii seediiɗo kala huunde
